description:
While Ryo has his gun taken away from creditors for failing to pay his rent, he is hired by a beautiful woman who is the owner of her own large company to appear on TV with her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Even Kaori`s Pissed: Ryo and a Young Lady, Pinch Hitter Marriage Story
Kaori mo Puttsun! Ryou to Reijou "Daida Kekkon Monogatari"
香もプッツン! 獠と令嬢"代打結婚物語"
